title: Bug 6304: Cannot sync a .java file and another resource
OB: When selecting a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer
EB: The files should be synchronized properly and any changes made to them should be reflected accurately
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the package viewer
2. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file)
3. Perform a sync operation
